text: Best Programming Language for Medical Image Processing
I am looking to build a medical solution to be used by surgeons to visualize Dicom images in 3D.
Also, the software will allow them to perform some segmentation and manipulation to the images.
I will probably use the VTK package www.vtk.org/ to assist with this project.
Now, I am wondering whether it is easier and better to do this project in C#, C++ or Python?
I appreciate any help in finding how to choose between these three options.
